## EcoDiffusion (R package)
Hierarchical Bayesian ecological diffusion for spatiotemporal population dynamics and forecasting.
- Growth: exponential / logistic
- Spatial basis for initial conditions
- C++ solvers and MCMC
- Reproducible workflows

## Population dynamics & movement
- Sage-grouse lek dynamics and spatial spread
- Effects of climate / land use on abundance and distribution

## Species distributions & human impacts
- Sea otter point processes; forecasting range dynamics under uncertainty
